website_summaries.verdict: True to its Japanese name that means “simplicity,” the Tanjun is a no-fuss sneaker that handles performance and style with aplomb. It is a very affordable shoe that still shines where comfort and looks go.For anyone who is looking for a simple, yet still, quite a catchy sneaker that can also double as a performance trainer could scarcely go wrong in this shoe. The very affordable price is clearly an icing on the cake for the Nike Tanjun.
pros: Most of the reviewers are almost unanimous in reporting that the Nike Tanjun sneaker is superbly comfortable
Many buyers are impressed by the lightness of the Tanjun from Nike
Several users have noted how well-ventilated this shoe is
It is among the Nike sneakers that are available in multiple color variations
Among the Nike Tanjun collection, this shoe is out of the box comfortable, according to some purchasers
More than a handful received compliments while wearing this shoe
A few reviewers like the shoe’s combination of support and flexibility
Some of the users who have wide feet found the fit just enough for them to be comfortable
The style is an easy match for a variety of outfits, as reported by a handful of Nike Tanjun reviews
The cushioning is surprisingly very good since it comes from a very light shoe, according to several users
cons: Several buyers have complained about the lack of durability coming from the different parts of the shoe
A handful of users are slightly disappointed that the Nike Tanjun lacked the midfoot hold they need

customer_reviews.title: I like the half sizes
customer_reviews.text: OK, look, these Nike are lightweight, well made, comfy AF, but I have to say, for me, they a narrow fitting. Just a tad. I like the half sizes, i got 10+1/2 UK and I have to say they are perfect. The soles are firmer / harder than I thought that they would be, there are bouncier trainers out there, but, i still give these a five star rating. They are well aerated and yet warm on the feet, by the way. I hope you enjoy your pair as much as I'm enjoying mine. So well priced, I might get a second pair for broader colour co-ordination with my wardrobe!
customer_reviews.author: JD Milton

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 10.5 in Nike but needed an 11 in these. The material at the toe is tight despite the look of flexibility and pulls down on your toes. More of a recreational trainer than proper sports wear. Nike have made the mid-foot area of their trainers narrower over recent years and i cant wear most of their premium trainers now unfortunately but these are a pinch wider in thus area and therefore manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Wemo

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Like the material and the weight of the shoe great for running but sizes were out. I’m normally a 9 (mens) and I ordered a 9.5 to be safe and these were to tight on my toes Would recommend getting a size bigger if to purchase
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Useless. No tread
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my worst purchase to date, no tread no grip. What little tread they had new disappeared after 2 months which resulted in me nearly killing myself slipping over 3 times before I realised I was wearing slicks. Seller wouldn’t entertain a refund request even after seeing the pictures
customer_reviews.author: G S

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Nike
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Fantastic. Arrived in a few days. Perfect packaging and the trainers are firs class. a top quality and stunning superb. I would recommend this suppler to any person. I am more than impressed. Personally i would purchase more trainers from this seller. Thank You to all staff and not to forget the postal service absolutely outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Mr Peter Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs of these, one which I wear for work where I am on my feet all day. I initially chose these for how simple they look, not like a lot of other shoes that look like alien spacecrafts. They feel light, with a bouncy bottom to them. Comfortable enough that they don't hurt my arch after long hours of standing, as I had this issue with other Nike trainers. Only issue is they are slightly annoying to clean, but that could just be me and due to the environment I am working in.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are extremely comfortable. They are a narrative fit and that is ideal for me but not so for someone who would normally take a wide fitting. The quality is good except that the eye holes for the laces have been cut roughly and will probably wear badly in time. I found that fitting them with elastic lock laces makes the fit even better -
customer_reviews.author: Peter Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best trainers ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved theses. They're the best trainers I've had in a long time! They're also extremely comfortable when wearing them, and surprisingly when it's raining the rain doesn't get in them! I thought it would for sure, but I was proven wrong! When running (outdoors especially) you can really feel the wind hitting your toes and it feels awesome! Especially if you're sweating after all the exercise you're doing ;)
customer_reviews.author: Gary Carr

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoes, always happy with nike, and they even add 3cm to my height :D
customer_reviews.author: Ten

customer_reviews.title: A good coftable trainer
customer_reviews.text: These a very light to wear very soft under foot the only problem i can for see is i dont think they will last long the qality of the trainer does not seem the best i have noticed that the soles are made from some kind of foam which i think will wear quickly they already have puncture marks in the sole where stones have struck them i would still rwcommend these foe comfort alone but only time will tell how long they will last
customer_reviews.author: Axel1234

customer_reviews.title: Really good lightweight summer trainers
customer_reviews.text: Favourite trainers at the moment. Had two pairs before this. More of a summer shoe, they are super lightweight and breathable and I’m able to slip them on easily with a good amount of sole to cushion walking.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have a ladies pair of these and they are lovely and comfy and light. My hubbie has problems with different trainers and these fitted him like a glove! Recommended. My daughter also purchased a pair! As long as we don’t all go for a walk together 🤔🤔
customer_reviews.author: holidaymaker

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for active work
customer_reviews.text: Walked to work with these and wore them. I’m a pharmacist at my local hospital, took the plunge to buy them based on the review written by the nurse on here. I’m in agreement with the sentiments expressed in that review: very breathable trainers that are comfy to be on your feet all day in.
customer_reviews.author: Georgeszone

customer_reviews.title: Great for gym and short runs, not for long distance running
customer_reviews.text: These are good trainers: light, comfortable, and reasonably flat on the bottom, so good for lifting at the gym. I wouldn't put in a lot of miles on them though, as they don't offer much support eg for the arch or for impact softening.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Baker

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for exercise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad as gym shoes. So far he has said these are comfortable and lightweight for exercise. It’s stylish in design and a good colour too. Downside is I found cheaper elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: April24

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes but expensive - regret buying them
customer_reviews.text: I really regret buying these wish I bought some Vans instead - they are expensive and I don't really like how they look in person. Plus side they are now my comfy dog walking trainers :(
customer_reviews.author: Shane J

customer_reviews.title: 😁
customer_reviews.text: The agreed arrival time was spot on! However, these trainers aren't really what is shown when previewing the item. They are comfy, but I presumed they were waterproof- I had a similar pair; I found the hard way and they're soaking. But overall, awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not suitable for the British weather
customer_reviews.text: I have one major issue with the shoes - they are just useless with wet weather. Ideal for sunny places or going to the gym, but if you plan to go outside with them, than I would suggest to take another pair of socks.
customer_reviews.author: The Master

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and comfortable trainers.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comforatble trainers I have ever worn, I buy the same trainers every 12-18 months, they are not very waterproof but perfect for dry weather and cool for the gym. Soles have good grip and the soles are soft for extra comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Grandad G

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are absolutely perfect, so light you forget you're wearing them which is brilliant for long distance walks and jogs, my feet feel way better wearing these than my previous Adidas shoes. A simplistic stylish look and in white really give a sporty look, 100% recommend, I've seen some reviews say they pinch too much at the end but as a Size 9 I got them in Size 9 and absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers, they're so comfortable and lightweight. They look stylish too. I didn't buy these to workout in so I can't comment there!

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not what i thought
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is an original nike as the soles are hard and don’t cushion your heels and feet. But it’s very lightweight however.

customer_reviews.text: As a Healthcare Assistant working 12 hour shifts in a hospital, these shoes are absolutely fantastic. The shoes are extremely breathable, so much in fact that when you walk you will feel air wafting in between your toes! They're also very fashionable and I use them to go out as well. All rounder shoes, can't ask for more.

customer_reviews.title: Cut your toenails!
customer_reviews.text: Just keep your toenails short, as you will go through the toes even more quickly than you already will. Comfortable though

customer_reviews.text: My son bought these trainers and he wore them straight away for several days non stop and they were really comfy the whole time, a good buy.

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and extremely light, can easily be used for gym and casual wear. Only downside is the product feels as though doing high explosive agility training would tear them to pieces. All in all, a must have if you're not planing to Use them for sprint training.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for work at the hospital. Very comfortable and so far durable. As an aside, I am a woman and my usual size 6 in the men's fits perfectly. I would love to understand why the women's pair was nearly £10 (or 20%!) more expensive.

customer_reviews.title: Oh so comfortable!

Looked at a number of trainers from adidas, Puma and Nike and having read really positive reviews about the Nike Tanjun trainers, I decided I'd get them. I don't know of the other trainers I looked at are better or worse but these are just amazing. Super comfortable and nice to wear for walking or just even keeping your feet in! Would highly recommend every day of the week!

I'm now having to buy a new pair of trainers. - They are quite slippery when it has been raining, even on the pavement

customer_reviews.title: fit is spot on 👌nice quality always abit wary buying off line and pay well over 100pounds for my sons trainers but I was quite surprised on how good they are for the price will definitely be buying ...

Can`t see an option to return them on Amazon so I presume they are now consigned to the bin!! Would not recommend unless you like changing your trainers every few months and can afford to do so!!

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Tanjun Trainers
product_meta.description: The Nike Tanjun Men's Shoe offers breathable comfort and maximum flexibility thanks to its lightweight upper and cushioned midsole. The breathable fabric upper offers a natural fit and the foam midsole / midsole a lightweight fit and long, durable cushioning. The deep flex grooves in the sole guarantee maximum flexibility.
feature_bullets: The Tanjun shoe is made of breathable fabric and two soles, mid-and outside, foam. This shoe provides better comfort and support.
